name: Phibro Animal Health Corporation
description: Phibro Animal Health Corporation is a global leader in animal health and nutrition, dedicated to improving the health and productivity of livestock and aquaculture. Founded in 1936 and headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, Phibro offers a diverse portfolio of products, including vaccines, pharmaceuticals, and nutritional supplements, which are designed to enhance animal welfare and optimize production efficiency. The company operates in more than 50 countries, providing innovative solutions that support the health of animals and the sustainability of the agricultural industry. Phibro's commitment to research and development has led to the introduction of cutting-edge technologies and effective solutions that address the evolving needs of farmers and veterinarians. The company also emphasizes its dedication to the environment and animal welfare, ensuring that its products and practices contribute positively to the agricultural ecosystem. With a strong focus on quality and regulatory compliance, Phibro Animal Health continues to expand its market presence through strategic partnerships and acquisitions, reinforcing its reputation as a trusted provider in the animal health sector.

seo.meta_title: Phibro Animal Health Corporation | Animal Health & Nutrition Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Phibro Animal Health Corporation, a leader in animal health and nutrition, committed to improving livestock and aquaculture health. Learn about our innovative products and solutions.

faq.question: What does Phibro specialize in?
faq.answer: Phibro specializes in animal health and nutrition, offering pharmaceuticals, vaccines, and nutritional supplements.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Phibro Animal Health?
faq.answer: D. A. (Avi) R. Z. Eyal is the CEO of Phibro Animal Health Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Phibro headquartered?
faq.answer: Phibro is headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Phibro offer?
faq.answer: Phibro offers products including antibiotics, vaccines, mineral supplements, and feed additives.
